How to Install troffcvt on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • troffcvt

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install troffcvt on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing troffcvt on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall troffcvt in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install troffcvt, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install troffcvt Using apt

To install troffcvt in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install troffcvt using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install troffcvt

The installation of troffcvt might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install troffcvt Using apt-get

To install troffcvt using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install troffcvt.

sudo apt-get -y install troffcvt

Install troffcvt Using Synaptic

To install troffcvt using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install troffcvt on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for troffcvt. This will display the troffcvt package in the package window, now to install troffcvt, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the troffcvt package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of troffcvt.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install troffcvt Using aptitude

To install troffcvt on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of troffcvt.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install troffcvt using the command aptitude install troffcvt.

sudo aptitude -y install troffcvt

How to Upgrade troffcvt on debian

If you want to upgrade the troffcvt package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade troffcvt using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade troffcvt to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade troffcvt.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade troffcvt sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade troffcvt

Upgrade troffcvt using Aptitude

To upgrade troffcvt using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade troffcvt.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade troffcvt

Upgrade troffcvt using Synaptic

To upgrade troffcvt using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for troffcvt, now right-click troffcvt, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade troffcvt just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall troffcvt on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall troffcvt from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just troffcvt, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove troffcvt

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of troffcvt

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of troffcvt you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge troffcvt

Remove troffcvt using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall troffcvt using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for troffcvt, right-click the troffcvt package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall troffcvt click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install troffcvt on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade troffcvt using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of troffcvt then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
